markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Sixfingers Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=791)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip. You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being [Disarmed](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) and a climb Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs=""
>
Sixfingers Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs=""
>
Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 1 hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs=""
>
Sixfingers Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 8 hours.
name: Sixfingers Elixir
